name: Neon Dice Roll
description:
Made  for the GMTK Game Jam 2022  with the theme of "Roll Of The Dice"

A Top Down Shooter where you weapon change when your roll.  Increased Combo and weapon power by rolling Six or roll the same number. Killing Enemy Increased your change to roll six.

CONTROLS

- Mouse - Aim

- Right Click - Roll toward Mouse Aim

- WASD - Move
